ARABIC: بِنَصْرِ ٱللَّهِ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: in Allah's help. He grants victory to whoever He wills. He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In the help of God. He helps whom He will; He is all-mighty, ever-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: at the victory granted by Allah. He grants victory to whomsoever He pleases. He is the Most Mighty, the Most Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He helps whomever He wants. He is Majestic and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: With the help of Allah; He helps whomever He wills; and only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: With the help of Allah. He helps whom He wills, and He is the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: With the help of Allah; He helps whom He pleases; and He is the Mighty, the Merciful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: in God's help; God helps whomsoever He will; and He is the All-mighty, the All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: In Allah's help to victory. He helpeth to victory whom He will. He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: with the help of God. He helps whom He pleases: He is the Mighty, and the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In Allah succour. He succoureth whomsoever He will, and He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: at Allah’s help. He helps whomever He wishes, and He is the All-mighty, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With the help of Allah. He helps whom He will, and He is exalted in might, most merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: With the help of Allah, He helps whom He wills, and He is the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: in the victory of Allah. Allah gives victory to whosoever He will, and He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In God’s support. He supports whomever He wills. He is the Almighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:5] in God’s help, to them against the Persians. They [the believers] indeed rejoiced in this, as they came to know of it on the day that it took place, on the day of [the battle of] Badr, when Gabriel came down with this [news] thereon, in addition to their rejoicing in their victory over the idolaters on that [same] day. He helps whomever He will; and He is the Mighty, the Victor, the Merciful, to believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: In Allah's help to victory) for Muhammad (pbuh) against his enemies and giving the upper hand to the Romans over the Persians. (He helpeth to victory whom He will) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh). (He is the Mighty) in retribution against Abu Jahl and his host on the Day of Badr, (the Merciful) towards the believers in Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions.
